en.sim:map-ground: Switch ground map on or off
en.sim:map-height: Switch height map on or off
en.sim:map-obstacles: Switch obstacles map on or off
en.sim:teacher: Switch customization mode on or off
en.sim:btn-button.forward: Simulate a touch on the forward button
en.sim:btn-button.left: Simulate a touch on the left button
en.sim:btn-button.center: Simulate a touch on the center button
en.sim:btn-button.right: Simulate a touch on the right button
en.sim:btn-button.backward: Simulate a touch on the backward button
